mapper.insert: insert into GSCLIENTMAIN (CLIENTCODE, CLIENTCNAME, CLIENTENAME, CLIENTTYPE, JOINDATE, BLACKLISTIND, FORMALIND, VIPIND, CANCELIND, CANCELREASON, CANCELDATE, RELATEDCLIENT, REMARK, FLAG, CONNECTION, POSTCODE, POSTADDRESS, QUALITYIND, CLIENTSTATUS, VISITIND, BANKCODE, ACCOUNTNO, MONEYLAUNDERINGIND, DIRECTCLIENTIND, SCANDOCIND, ORIGINCLIENTCODE, RELATECLIENTCODE, CREATORCODE, CREATETIME, UPDATERCODE, UPDATETIME, ITEMPROVINCECODE, ITEMCITYCODE, ITEMPROVINCECNAME, ITEMCITYCNAME, STARLEVEL, SPECIALCLIENT, IDCARDVALIDITY) values (#{clientcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clienttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{blacklistind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formalind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canceldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{relatedclient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualityind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moneylaunderingind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directclientind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scandocind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originclientcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relateclientcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemprovincecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcitycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemprovincecname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcitycname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialclient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardvalidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
